member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods defined for the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMD5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a string with MD5 decrypt method
member.param: The string which will be hashed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the string can be convert to a with value true
member.returns: True if the string can be converted to the "true".

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string in title case.
member.returns: Returns the string in title case.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a substring which is between and . Search starts from index.
member.param: The left delimiter of the result string.
The right delimiter of the result string.
The start position of the search.
member.returns: A string that is equivalent to the substring which is between and searching from or System.String.Empty if or don't occur within this instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all occurrences of Cyrillic letters with their corresponding Latin latters.
member.returns: Returns a string in which all instances of Cyrillic letters are replaced with their Latin equivalents.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all occurrences of Latin letters with their corresponding Cyrillic latters.
member.returns: Returns a string in which all instances of Latin letters are replaced with their Cyrillic equivalents.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string in which the Cyrillic letters are replaced with their Latin equivalents and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the period ".") are removed.
member.returns: A copy of this instance where all Cyrillic letters are replaced with their Latin equivalents and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the period ".") are removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string in which the Cyrillic letters are replaced with their Latin equivalents, spaces are replaced with hyphens and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the period "." and hyphen "-") are removed.
member.returns: A copy of this instance where all Cyrillic letters are replaced with their Latin equivalents, spaces are replaced with hyphens and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the period "." and hyphen "-") are removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a substring of this instance which starts from the beginning and whose length is the lesser of the string's length and .
member.param: The number of characters in the substring.
member.returns: A string containing the first characters of this instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Extract the file extension of the string (interpreted as a file name). The period "." is omitted.
member.returns: Returns the last item in the array which is obtained by splitting the string by the period "." character.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the corresponding content type (a.k.a. Internet media type) for the specified file extension.
member.returns: The content type as a string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a set of characters from the specified character array into a sequence of bytes.
member.returns: A byte array containing the specified set of characters.
